messages.msgSnippet: Kelli:Thanks for the correction. lol.Sorry about that I ve only had three hours sleep.Yes I meant flies. Although Lord of the Rings did have a violent social
messages.messageBody:
Kelli:Thanks for the correction. lol.Sorry about that I've only had three hours sleep.Yes I meant flies.

Although Lord of the Rings did have a violent social climate.

diane

messages.subject: Re:getting to bed
messages.msgSnippet: In Lord of the Rings you had a group of children that came from a very strictly disciplined and structured military or boarding school type situation in which
messages.messageBody:
In Lord of the Rings you had a group of children that came from a very strictly disciplined and structured

military or boarding school type situation in which 24/7 they were following rules and then all of a sudden

they are on their own free to make all their own decisions and they do not know how to act. They went

rather temperarily insane. I bet if that had been a group of children that had been unschooled and had

received uncoersive parenting they would have gotten along just fine and would have become a very

functional group because they already knew how to think for themselves and use problem solving skills.

diane


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
